Job Description:
Job Description : 

1) Excellent knowledge of .Net framework, web services (C#.net, VB.net, ASP.NET, AJAX, HTML, XML, OOPS and OOAD Concepts) 

2) Proficient in at least two- core development tools used within the company 

3) Sound Proficiency in Databases- MS SQL Server, Oracle 

4) Microsoft Certification (Microsoft Certified Professional Developer) 

5) Should be a key learner and adapt to understand requirement, develop code while maintaining quality and coding standards 

5) Sound knowledge of estimation technique & design patterns 

6) Sound industry trends awareness 

7) Sound Knowledge of unit testing methodologies and frameworks 

8) Proficient in writing technical documents with flow charts and design
